resources.string: Studying the source of this app is the best way to start learning Engine3d based on min3D:\n (Engine3D) http://mickey.acer.com.tw/gitweb/?p=acer/lib/android/Engine3D.git\n (min3D) http://code.google.com/p/min3d
"This is an example of placing a 3D scene within a conventional XML-based Android layout."

"In publishing and graphic design, lorem ipsum is the name given to commonly used placeholder text (filler text) to demonstrate the graphic elements of a document or visual presentation, such as font, typography, and layout."
